text: learning anything new can be hard and
challenging for people with disabilities
one can shift their perspective their
learning anything new is daunting
towards learning can be a way of
broadening the mindset tomok is a
non-profit organization in Singapore
serving the communities of persons with
disabilities and students with special
educational needs really believe that
differently everyday communities should
be part of our Singapore growth story we
want to ensure our participants gain in
demand skills from the growth sectors in
our economy there were four tracks under
Thomas Talent accelerated program as
work for home has become a new norm and
Cloud being the future of technology I
was especially interested in the cloud
analytic track this course was offered
by AWS the lead cloud service provider
in this field when I enrolled in tomurex
Talent accelerator program I met my
mentor Valerie from AWS I felt really
comfortable sharing my struggles and my
concerns when it comes to my upcoming
University and career path and she also
was able to openly share with me her own
Journey from University to her role now
in AWS through this program I was able
to Mentor a differently able youth I
made sure my mentee was that in every
step of the way by having an open
communication and through her sharings
on her experiences her passions and her
interests I was able to tailor my
guidance and advice for her to learn
as someone who is a family member of a
person with special needs I find that
design and technology is important in
shaping an inclusive Society also in
creating an inclusive workplace so that
everyone can communicate everyone can
consume media everyone can work it is
our mission to provide Equitable
employment opportunities for all we look
forward to deepening the collaboration
with AWS Education team so that more
students with special educational needs
can benefit from our cooperation
while studying for this AWS Cloud
practitioner certification I was
struggling with the industry project
under the commod tell us with the
program however with shared
determination and Howard I passed the
examination and I'm very grateful for it
I'm exploring the possibility of
pursuing a degree in Business analytics
to stay competitive and remain valuable
in today's skill based economy
